typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,`[^a-zA-Z0-9]`,'') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source1 derive({my bad __ Co$$!!!umn} = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		movie = ovie,
		title = itle,
		genres = enres,
		year = ear,
		Rating = ating,
		{Rotton Tomato} = RottonTomato
	)) ~> sink1
